name: Export BigMarker registrants to Google Sheets
description: This template helps you export a list of BigMarker registrants to Google Sheets. Make will automatically extract each registrant for a specified conference and add their information in a new Google Sheets row. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13Kw6yWg4x3-_ycySGHn9z6Hs03v9A7MjWxvgKXvWyHM/edit?usp=sharing).
